description: Manage soft-deleted Azure API Management services.

commands.name: az apim deletedservice list
commands.summary: List all soft-deleted Api Management services instances available for undelete for the given subscription.

commands.name: az apim deletedservice purge
commands.summary: Purge soft-deleted Api Management service instance (deletes it with no option to undelete).
examples: az apim deletedservice purge --service-name MyApim --location westus

commands.name: az apim deletedservice show
commands.summary: Get soft-deleted Api Management service instances available for undelete by name.
examples: az apim deletedservice show --service-name MyApim --location westus
